page.title: 18An old-age pensioner
page.content: This old gentleman is now 102 years old and has had many occupations in his life.At first he was a dyer,but then the First World War broke out and he went into Civil Defence.Later in his life he worked for the City Transport, driving a bus.Now he has retired and is an old age pensioner. He was born in Bentham in Lancashire and then moved to Windhill.When he married he moved to live with his wife in Thackley. He has lived here with his wife in a small cottage for 15 years. He likes living in Thackley as the shops are not too far away and they are easy to get to.When he was told about this information being written up on computer discs he was very startled.
